cast.name: 玛丽·麦克唐纳 Mary McDonnell

this_title: Battlestar Galactica: The Story So Far
trans_title: 太空堡垒卡拉狄加：迄今为止的故事
introduction: Battlestar Galactica: Told from the perspective of President Laura Roslin, the special tells the story of a refugee fleet of survivors as they flee the destruction of their Twelve Colonies and embark on a quest for an uncharted new homeland: Earth.
chinese_title: 太空堡垒卡拉狄加：迄今为止的故事
foreign_title: Battlestar Galactica: The Story So Far
